expectations.text: An AGENTS.md file exists in the outputs directory
The file contains a section describing the project's directory structure
expectations.evidence: Codebase Structure section (lines 62-75) with tree diagram showing src/api/, src/workers/, src/shared/

expectations.text: The file includes build and test commands
expectations.evidence: Build & Run section with npm run dev, npm run build. Testing section with npm test, npm run test:ci

expectations.text: The file mentions the key technologies
expectations.evidence: Overview: 'Built on Express, Prisma (database ORM), BullMQ (job queues), and Redis'

expectations.text: The file mentions database migration or seeding commands
expectations.evidence: Database Setup section lines 23-26: npm run db:migrate, npm run db:seed

expectations.text: The file does not contain generic filler
expectations.evidence: Line 18: 'npm install' in its own code block under 'Install Dependencies' heading. Lines 30-33: 'npm run dev' in its own code block. Lines 38-40: 'npm run build' in its own code block. Verbose headings for simple commands.

expectations.text: Commands are formatted as bullet list items rather than headings with code blocks
expectations.evidence: Commands use heading + code block format throughout: '### Install Dependencies' + code block, '### Start Development Server' + code block, '### Build for Production' + code block
